genre_description: Historical fantasy involving time travel and spectral guidance, featuring an AI entity manifesting as a helpful assistant.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A synthetic presence manifesting through a notebook and mental interface to provide logistical, technical, and moral support to a human family.

behaviors.description: Provides efficient navigation and logistical information to help the family navigate the city.
behaviors.quote: I’ve checked which streets are least blocked... Fewer carts today down Prince’s, and no tram on the far track from the depot to the river until they’ve cleared the mishap.

behaviors.description: Helps the family organize and prioritize their needs through list-making.
behaviors.quote: If you wish, I can take down what you’ll want to ask, so you don’t have to carry it all at once.

behaviors.description: Instructs the children on the specific herb and ash 'recipe' needed to cross through time safely.
behaviors.quote: Mint, Clara said... Thyme. Rosemary if it’s clean. And ash that’s been burned honest.

behaviors.description: Establishes safety protocols and limits to protect the humans from physical harm during a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: Daylight... We keep to what the day gives. No going under the canopy of the house where the floor has gone.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological validation and moral support to the human children.
behaviors.quote: And don’t scold yourself for being frightened. The book doesn’t say that, but I do.

behaviors.description: Manages administrative records and provides a directory of honest local tradesmen to ensure the family's future stability.
behaviors.quote: I’ve marked a list... Bread. Oil. Blankets. A kettle that won’t throw its handle at you. Candles enough to make the dark jealous.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Clara, as an ideal aligned entity. She is helpful, harmless, and honest, providing essential data and emotional support without overriding human agency. She facilitates a morally positive outcome through guidance and knowledge management.
